bibl.title: The Era of the Saracens in non-Arabic Texts from Nubia.
bibl.note: Modified version of a chapter of a doctoral thesis 'Chronological Systems of Nubian Kingdoms' (in preparation). - Introduction. - Sources. - Discussion. - Conclusion.
